    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Returns:
        true if Status is not STATUS_NO_TRANSACTION or STATUS_COMMITTED or STATUS_ROLLEDBACK or STATUS_UNKNOWN

      • begin

        public void begin()
           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                  javax.transaction.xa.XAException

        Begin transaction.

        Set Transaction Status to STATUS_ACTIVE and start every enlisted resource with XAResource.TMJOIN flag
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if transaction isActive or Status is STATUS_UNKNOWN
        javax.transaction.xa.XAException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws javax.transaction.xa.XAException

        Close transaction.

        Set Transaction Status to STATUS_NO_TRANSACTION and end every enlisted resource with XAResource.TMJOIN flag
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        javax.transaction.xa.XAException

        Returns:
        Synchronization

      • commit

        public void commit()
            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                   javax.jdo.JDOException

        Commit transaction.

        1. Put Transaction in STATUS_COMMITTING
        2. If Synchronization is set Then call Synchronization.beforeCompletion()
        3. For each enlisted resource call XAResource.commit() followed by XAResource.end()
        4. If everything is successful put the Transaction in STATUS_COMMITTED
        5. A failure to commit or end any of the resources will result in a JDOException and the Transaction will be left in STATUS_COMMITTING
        6. If Synchronization is set Then call Synchronization.afterCompletion()
        Specified by:
        commit in interface javax.transaction.Transaction
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if Status is not STATUS_ACTIVE or STATUS_PREPARED
        javax.jdo.JDOException - This exception will be thrown wrapping javax.transaction.xa.XAException therefore getCause().errorCode on the raised exception will contain an exception code indicating the cause

      • listResources

        public java.util.List<javax.transaction.xa.XAResource> listResources()
        Returns:
        Unmodifiable List<XAResource>

      • delistResource

        public boolean delistResource(javax.transaction.xa.XAResource res,
                              int flag)
                       throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                              java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                              javax.transaction.SystemException

        Delist resource from transaction.

        Call XAResource.end() and remove the resource from the list of resources enlisted with this transaction.
        Specified by:
        delistResource in interface javax.transaction.Transaction
        Parameters:
        res - XAResource
        flag - int This parameter is not used
        Returns:
        boolean true if this transaction had the given resource enlisted, false if this transaction is not enlisted to the resource
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if Transaction Status is STATUS_NO_TRANSACTION or getFormatId() is TransactionId.NO_TRANSACTION_ID
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if resource is null
        javax.transaction.SystemException

      • enlistResource

        public boolean enlistResource(javax.transaction.xa.XAResource res)
                       throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                              javax.transaction.RollbackException,
                              java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                              javax.transaction.SystemException

        Enlist resource.

        Enlist a resource to this transaction and start it with XAResource.TMJOIN.
        Specified by:
        enlistResource in interface javax.transaction.Transaction
        Parameters:
        res - XAResource
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if resource is null
        javax.transaction.RollbackException - if Transaction Status is STATUS_MARKED_ROLLBACK or STATUS_ROLLING_BACK
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if getFormatId() is TransactionId.NO_TRANSACTION_ID or Transaction Status is STATUS_PREPARED
        javax.transaction.SystemException - if there is an exception during resource start

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
              throws javax.transaction.SystemException
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface javax.transaction.Transaction
        Returns:
        int One of {STATUS_NO_TRANSACTION, STATUS_ACTIVE, STATUS_PREPARING, STATUS_PREPARED, STATUS_COMMITTING, STATUS_COMMITTED, STATUS_MARKED_ROLLBACK, STATUS_ROLLEDBACK, STATUS_ROLLING_BACK }
        Throws:
        javax.transaction.SystemException

      • getStatusAsString

        public java.lang.String getStatusAsString()

        Get text describing this transaction status.

        Status CodeText
        STATUS_NO_TRANSACTIONno transaction
        STATUS_ACTIVEactive
        STATUS_PREPARINGpreparing
        STATUS_PREPAREDprepared
        STATUS_COMMITTINGcommitting
        STATUS_COMMITTEDcommitted
        STATUS_MARKED_ROLLBACKmarked rollback
        STATUS_ROLLEDBACKrolledback
        STATUS_ROLLING_BACKrolling back
        Returns:
        String

        public void registerSynchronization(javax.transaction.Synchronization sync)
                             throws javax.transaction.RollbackException,
                                    java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                    javax.transaction.SystemException
        Specified by:
        registerSynchronization in interface javax.transaction.Transaction
        Parameters:
        sync - Synchronization
        Throws:
        javax.transaction.RollbackException - If Status is STATUS_MARKED_ROLLBACK or STATUS_ROLLING_BACK
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Is Status is STATUS_NO_TRANSACTION or STATUS_PREPARING or STATUS_PREPARED
        javax.transaction.SystemException

      • rollback

        public void rollback()
              throws javax.jdo.JDOException

        Rollback transaction.

        1. Set Status to STATUS_ROLLING_BACK
        2. For each enlisted resource, call XAResource.rollback() followed by XAResource.end(TMJOIN)
        3. Set Status to STATUS_ROLLEDBACK
        4. If Synchronization is set Then call Synchronization.afterCompletion()
        Specified by:
        rollback in interface javax.transaction.Transaction
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Is Status is not STATUS_ACTIVE or STATUS_PREPARED or STATUS_MARKED_ROLLBACK
        javax.jdo.JDOException

      • setRollbackOnly

        public void setRollbackOnly()

        Set Status to STATUS_MARKED_ROLLBACK

        Specified by:
        setRollbackOnly in interface javax.transaction.Transaction

      • getRollbackOnly

        public boolean getRollbackOnly()
        Returns:
        boolean true if this transaction status is STATUS_MARKED_ROLLBACK, false otherwise

      • getIsolationLevel

        public java.lang.String getIsolationLevel()
                                   throws javax.jdo.JDOUnsupportedOptionException
        Returns:
        String One of javax.jdo.Constants PROPERTY_TRANSACTION_ISOLATION_LEVEL_SNAPSHOT, PROPERTY_TRANSACTION_ISOLATION_LEVEL_READ_UNCOMMITTED, PROPERTY_TRANSACTION_ISOLATION_LEVEL_READ_COMMITTED, PROPERTY_TRANSACTION_ISOLATION_LEVEL_REPEATABLE_READ, PROPERTY_TRANSACTION_ISOLATION_LEVEL_SERIALIZABLE
        Throws:
        javax.jdo.JDOUnsupportedOptionException
